Name: Invoke: Orb
Desc:
Throws a magical orb that flies towards the Crystal. If there is no Crystal, it flies straight forward. Orb leaves a Bless Mark on you, and temporarily increases Invoke: Javelin's damage.
It shares the skill level with Invoke: Javelin, and can be linked together.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn 2nd Skill, Reaction: Domination, and 4th Skill, Invoke: Orb II.
